TopicTitle: 0.16 Rendevous and EVA Crew Exchange Video

Articles.Content:
The moment I realised EVA\'s were possible and crews could leave the capsules, I instantly asked the question - do they have to go back to the same one?

So the very first thing I did as soon as KSP 0.16 was downloaded, was try something I\'d never successfully acomplised in KSP, a Rendevous. But not only that, to EVA from two craft, and land with different crew.

This is the story of the EVA Crew Exchange Experiment... Where new heights were reached, and new heroes were born.
You did something I will never be able to do in a million years 8)
I did the same but with three ships and without RCS. It was hell.

Incidentally, if you\'re on an EVA and end the flight, you end the EVA without returning to the capsule: you wind up with an empty seat.

Might be a way to make a rescue ship.
